name: Name
phone_will_add: * this phone will be added to your profile
devided_order: Pay attention! Your order has been divided into several independent, according to sellers.
leave_your_comments: Leave your comment on the order (address, shipping)
your_order_success: Your order has been successfully sent!
alert_str1: Your order has been successfully sent. We will contact you shortly.
alert_str1_plural: Your multiple orders have been successfully accepted. We will contact you shortly.
text_empty_cart: Unfortunately, while you were placing the Order, changes were made by the suppliers. The ordered product is currently unavailable. We have removed the item(s) from your Cart.
text_cart_updated: While you were placing the Order, changes were made by the suppliers. Maybe the product has become unavailable or the price has been changed. We have adjusted your basket. We suggest you review the updated Order and proceed with the registration.
order_msg1: Your order has been successfully received and will be processed shortly. Order number:
order_msg1_plural: Your multiple orders have been successfully received and will be processed shortly. Order numbers:
order_msg2_plural: (we also sent you separate emails for each order)
